segments.text: Good afternoon . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ m here to see Joanna Stevens . I have an appointment at four .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , may I take your name ? I ’ ll let her know you ’ Ve arrived .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , it ’ s Josh O ’ Neil .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ms . Stevens will be with you momentarily . Can I offer you something to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , a coffee would be nice , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Ms . Stevens is ready for you now . I ’ ll show you to her office , right this way .
segments.speaker: S1
